item.title: 自定义类
item.description:
自定义飞书块类
#

</> python 
  1class block:
  2    '''一个block为一行
  3
  4        :param content:
  5            str:{content:None}
  6            dict:{content:style}
  7        :param blocktype:
  8            2：文本 Block
  9            3：标题 1 Block
 10            4：标题 2 Block
 11            5：标题 3 Block
 12            6：标题 4 Block
 13            7：标题 5 Block
 14            8：标题 6 Block
 15            13：有序列表 Block
 16            27：image Block
 17            ...
 18            参考:https://open.feishu.cn/document/server-docs/docs/docs/docx-v1/document-block/create#1b8abd5d
 19        :param indent:
 20            首行缩进级别。仅支持对 Text 块进行修改，其余类型不生效。
 21            示例值："NoIndent"
 22            可选值有：
 23                NoIndent：无缩进
 24                OneLevelIndent：一级缩进
 25
 26        :param align:
 27            对齐方式
 28            1：居左排版
 29            2：居中排版
 30            3：居右排版
 31            默认值：1
 32
 33        :param background_color
 34            LightGrayBackground：浅灰色
 35            LightRedBackground：浅红色
 36            LightOrangeBackground：浅橙色
 37            LightYellowBackground：浅黄色
 38            LightGreenBackground：浅绿色
 39            LightBlueBackground：浅蓝色
 40            LightPurpleBackground：浅紫色
 41            PaleGrayBackground：中灰色
 42            DarkGrayBackground：灰色
 43            DarkRedBackground：中红色
 44            DarkOrangeBackground：中橙色
 45            DarkYellowBackground：中黄色
 46            DarkGreenBackground：中绿色
 47            DarkBlueBackground：中蓝色
 48            DarkPurpleBackground：中紫色
 49    '''
 50    class Content:
 51        '''
 52        Text Content自定义样式支持：
 53            bold
 54                示例值：true
 55                默认值：false
 56
 57            italic
 58                示例值：true
 59                默认值：false
 60
 61            strikethrough 删除线
 62                示例值：true
 63                默认值：false
 64
 65            underline 下划线
 66                示例值：true
 67                默认值：false
 68
 69            inline_code inline代码
 70                示例值：true
 71                默认值：false
 72
 73            background_color 背景色
 74                可选值有：
 75                1：浅红色
 76                2：浅橙色
 77                3：浅黄色
 78                4：浅绿色
 79                5：浅蓝色
 80                6：浅紫色
 81                7：中灰色
 82                8：红色
 83                9：橙色
 84                10：黄色
 85                11：绿色
 86                12：蓝色
 87                13：紫色
 88                14：灰色
 89                15：浅灰色
 90
 91            text_color 字体颜色
 92                可选值有：
 93                1：红色
 94                2：橙色
 95                3：黄色
 96                4：绿色
 97                5：蓝色
 98
 99            link 链接
100                url 超链接指向的 url (需要 url_encode)
101                    示例值："https%3A%2F%2Fopen.feishu.cn%2F"
102        '''
103        def __init__(self, content) -> None:
104            if isinstance(content, dict):
105                self.contents = {
106                    c:style
107                    for c, style in content.items()
108                }
109            else:
110                self.contents = {str(content):{}}
111        
112        def __iter__(self):
113            return iter(self.contents.items())
114        
115        def __contains__(self, k):
116            return k in self.contents
117
118    def __init__(self, content, blocktype=2, indent='NoIndent', align=1, background_color=None) -> None:
119        self.type = blocktype
120        self.indent = indent
121        self.align = align
122        self.background_color = background_color
123        self.content = None
124        if blocktype != 27 and content!= None:
125            self.content = self.Content(content)
126    
127    __doc__ = __doc__ + Content.__doc__

自定义飞书请求异常类
#

</> python 
 1class LarkException(Exception):
 2    def __init__(self, code=0, msg=None):
 3        self.code = code
 4        self.msg = msg
 5
 6    def __str__(self) -> str:
 7        return "{}:{}".format(self.code, self.msg)
 8
 9    __repr__ = __str__
10
11
12def request(method, url, headers, payload=None, data=None, retry=6, timeout=None, rcode=0):
13    e = None
14    err_resp = None
15    resp = {}
16    while retry:
17        try:
18            response = requests.request(method, url, headers=headers, json=payload, data=data, timeout=timeout)
19            try:
20                resp = response.json()
21            except:
22                pass
23            code = resp.get("code", None)
24            if code == -1:
25                code = resp.get("StatusCode", -1)
26            if code == -1 and response.status_code != 200:
27                response.raise_for_status()
28            if code != None and code != rcode:
29                raise LarkException(code=code, msg=resp.get("msg", ""))
30            break
31        except KeyboardInterrupt:
32            print('\n停止')
33            raise KeyboardInterrupt
34        except:
35            print(f'request retry {retry}...')
36            e = traceback.format_exc()
37            err_resp = resp
38            retry -= 1
39            time.sleep(0.1)
40    else:
41        raise requests.RequestException(str(e)+str(err_resp))
42    
43    return resp

自定义飞书client请求方法类
#

</> python 
  1class Client(object):
  2    APP_ID = ''
  3    APP_SECRET = ''
  4    LARK_HOST = 'https://open.feishu.cn/'
  5
  6    def __init__(self):
  7        self._host = self.LARK_HOST
  8        self.token = self.get_tenant_access_token()
  9
 10    def get_tenant_access_token(self):
 11        url = self._host + "/open-apis/auth/v3/app_access_token/internal/"
 12        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}
 13        payload = {'app_id': self.APP_ID, 'app_secret': self.APP_SECRET}
 14        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 15        return resp['tenant_access_token']
 16
 17    ############################### DOCX API ######################################
 18    def createdocx(self, title, folder_token=None, access_token=None):
 19        '''
 20        :return:
 21            document id
 22        '''
 23        url = self._host + '/open-apis/docx/v1/documents'
 24        folder_token = '' if not folder_token else folder_token
 25        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 26        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 27        payload = {"title": title, "folder_token": folder_token}
 28        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 29        return resp['data']['document']['document_id']
 30
 31    def fetchblocks(self, document_id, block_id=None, access_token=None):
 32        url1 = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks'
 33        url2 = self._host + f"/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children"
 34        url = url2 if block_id else url1
 35        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 36        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 37        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
 38        return resp
 39    
 40    def creategrid(self, document_id:str, col:int, access_token=None) -> list:
 41        '''
 42        创建分栏块，col: 2 ~ 5
 43        :return:
 44            children block list
 45        '''
 46        if col < 2:
 47            return document_id
 48        url = f'{self._host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{document_id}/children'
 49        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 50        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 51        payload = {
 52            "index": -1,
 53            "children": [
 54                {
 55                    "block_type": 24,
 56                    "grid": {
 57                        "column_size": 5 if col > 5 else col,
 58                    }
 59                }
 60            ]
 61        }
 62        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
 63        return resp['data']['children'][0]['children']
 64
 65    def createblocks(self, document_id:str, blocks, block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
 66        '''
 67        创建文本块
 68        
 69        block_type支持：
 70            - text(2)
 71            - heading1~6(3~8)
 72            - 列表(无序:12，有序:13)
 73            - 代码块(14)
 74            - 引用(15)
 75            - 代办(17)
 76
 77        :param blocks:
 78            block or block list
 79        :return:
 80            children block id list
 81        '''
 82        if not isinstance(blocks, list):
 83            blocks = [blocks]
 84        if not block_id:
 85            block_id = document_id
 86        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
 87        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
 88        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
 89        blockmap = {2: "text", 3: "heading1", 4: "heading2", 5: "heading3", 6: "heading4", 7: "heading5", 8: "heading6"
 90                    , 12: "bullet", 13:"ordered", 14:"code", 15:"quote", 17:"todo", 27:"image"}
 91        payload = {
 92            "index": insert_index,
 93            "children": [
 94                {
 95                    "block_type": block.type,
 96                    blockmap[block.type]: {
 97                        "style":{
 98                            "indentation_level": block.indent,
 99                            "align":block.align,
100                            "background_color":block.background_color,
101                        } if block.type == 2 else {},
102                        "elements": [
103                            {
104                                "text_run": {
105                                    "content": content,
106                                    "text_element_style": style
107                                },
108                            }
109                            for content, style in block.content
110                        ],
111                    } if block.content else {}
112                }
113                for block in blocks
114            ]
115        }
116        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
117
118        # 限制api请求频率
119        time.sleep(0.1)
120        childrenblocks = []
121        if resp['code'] == 0:
122            childrenblocks = [c['block_id'] for c in resp['data']['children']]
123        return childrenblocks
124    
125    def createsheet(self, document_id:str, row:int, col:int, 
126                   block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
127        '''
128        创建docx内置电子表格
129        :param merge coord:
130            合并坐标从下标1开始，比如第2行第2列到第3行第4列，start:(2, 2) end:(3, 4)
131        :return:
132            spreadsheet_token, sheet_id
133        '''
134        if row < 1 or col < 1:
135            return None
136        if not block_id:
137            block_id = document_id
138        url = f'{self._host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
139        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
140        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
141        extra_row = 0 if row < 10 else (row - 9)
142        extra_col = 0 if col < 10 else (col - 9)
143        payload = {
144            "index": insert_index,
145            "children": [
146                {
147                    "block_type": 30,
148                    "sheet": {
149                        "row_size": 9 if extra_row else row,
150                        "column_size": 9 if extra_col else col,
151                    }
152                }
153            ]
154        }
155        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
156        if None != (code:=resp.get('code', None)):
157            if code != 0: raise LarkException(resp['code'], resp['msg'])
158        else: 
159            print(resp)
160            return None
161        spreadsheet_token, sheet_id = resp['data']['children'][0]['sheet']['token'].split('_')
162        url =  f'{self._host}/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/dimension_range'
163        if extra_row:
164            payload = {
165                "dimension":{
166                    "sheetId":sheet_id,
167                    "majorDimension":'ROWS',
168                    "length":extra_row,
169                },
170            }
171            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
172
173        if extra_col:
174            payload = {
175                "dimension":{
176                    "sheetId":sheet_id,
177                    "majorDimension":'COLUMNS',
178                    "length":extra_col,
179                },
180            }
181            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
182    
183        return spreadsheet_token, sheet_id
184    
185    def createtable(self, document_id:str, row:int, col:int, 
186                   column_width:list=[],
187                   merge_start_coord:tuple=None,
188                   merge_end_coord:tuple=None,
189                   header_row:bool=False,
190                   header_column:bool=False,
191                   block_id:str=None, access_token=None) -> list:
192        '''
193        创建docx普通表格
194        :param merge coord:
195            合并坐标从下标1开始，比如第2行第2列到第3行第4列，start:(2, 2) end:(3, 4)
196        :return:
197            table_block_id, childrenblocks
198        '''
199        if row < 1 or col < 1:
200            return None
201        if not block_id:
202            block_id = document_id
203        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
204        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
205        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
206        extra_row = 0 if row < 10 else (row - 9)
207        extra_col = 0 if col < 10 else (col - 9)
208        payload = {
209            "index": -1,
210            "children": [
211                {
212                    "block_type": 31,
213                    "table": {
214                        "property": {
215                            "row_size": 9 if extra_row else row,
216                            "column_size": 9 if extra_col else col,
217                            "column_width": column_width,
218                            "header_row":header_row,
219                            "header_column":header_column,
220                        }
221                    }
222                }
223            ]
224        }
225        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
226        childrenblocks = []
227        if resp['code'] == 0:
228            childrenblocks = [c for c in resp['data']['children'][0]['children']]
229        table_id = resp['data']['children'][0]['block_id']
230
231        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{table_id}'
232        while extra_row:
233            payload = {
234                'insert_table_row':{
235                    "row_index": -1,
236                },
237            }
238            request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
239            extra_row -= 1
240            # 接口频率限制 3次/秒
241            time.sleep(0.34)
242
243        while extra_col:
244            payload = {
245                'insert_table_column':{
246                    "column_index": -1,
247                },
248            }
249            request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
250            extra_col -= 1
251            # 接口频率限制 3次/秒
252            time.sleep(0.34)
253
254        if not merge_start_coord or not merge_end_coord:
255            return table_id, childrenblocks
256        payload = {
257            'merge_table_cells':{
258                "row_start_index":merge_start_coord[0]-1,
259                "row_end_index":merge_end_coord[0],
260                "column_start_index":merge_start_coord[1]-1,
261                "column_end_index":merge_end_coord[1],
262            }
263        }
264        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
265
266        return table_id, childrenblocks
267    
268    def merge_table_cell(self, document_id, table_id, merge_start_coord, merge_end_coord, access_token=None):
269        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{table_id}'
270        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
271        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
272        payload = {
273            'merge_table_cells':{
274                "row_start_index":merge_start_coord[0]-1,
275                "row_end_index":merge_end_coord[0],
276                "column_start_index":merge_start_coord[1]-1,
277                "column_end_index":merge_end_coord[1],
278            }
279        }
280        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
281    
282    def updateblocktext(self, document_id:str, block_id:str, block:block, access_token=None):
283        '''
284        更新块文本
285        '''
286        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}'
287        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
288        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
289        payload = {
290            'update_text' if block.content != None else 'update_text_style':{
291                "style":{
292                    "indentation_level": block.indent,
293                    "align":block.align,
294                    "background_color":block.background_color,
295                },
296                "elements": [
297                    {
298                        "text_run": {
299                            "content": content,
300                            "text_element_style": style
301                        },
302                    }
303                    for content, style in block.content
304                ] if block.content != None else None,
305                "fields":[1, 7] + ([6] if block.background_color else []),
306            },
307        }
308        request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
309        # 限制api请求频率
310        time.sleep(0.1)
311        return
312    
313    def createcallout(self, document_id:str, background_color=2, border_color=2, text_color=None, emoji='bust_in_silhouette', block_id:str=None, insert_index:int=-1, access_token=None) -> list:
314        '''
315        创建高亮块
316        return:
317            blockid, child_id
318        
319        background_color:
320            1：浅红色
321            2：浅橙色
322            3：浅黄色
323            4：浅绿色
324            5：浅蓝色
325            6：浅紫色
326            7：中灰色
327            8：中红色
328            9：中橙色
329            10：中黄色
330            11：中绿色
331            12：中蓝色
332            13：中紫色
333            14：灰色
334            15：浅灰色
335
336        border_color/test_color:
337            1：红色
338            2：橙色
339            3：黄色
340            4：绿色
341            5：蓝色
342            6：紫色
343            7：灰色
344
345        高亮块emoji参考：https://open.feishu.cn/document/docs/docs/data-structure/emoji
346        '''
347        if not block_id:
348            block_id = document_id
349        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children'
350        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
351        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
352        payload = {
353            "index": insert_index,
354            "children": [
355                {
356                    "block_type": 19,
357                    'callout': {
358                        "background_color": background_color, 
359                        "border_color": border_color,
360                        "text_color": text_color,
361                        'emoji_id':emoji,
362                    }
363                }
364            ]
365        }
366        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
367        bid, cid = resp['data']['children'][0]['block_id'], resp['data']['children'][0]['children'][0]
368        # 限制api请求频率
369        time.sleep(0.1)
370        return bid, cid
371    
372
373    def updateblockimage(self, document_id:str, block_id:str, image_token=None, img_property:dict={}, access_token=None):
374        '''
375        img_property:
376            width:
377                图片宽度，单位像素（px）
378            height:
379                图片高度，单位像素（px）
380            align:
381                对齐方式
382                可选值有：
383                1：居左排版
384                2：居中排版
385                3：居右排版
386        '''
387        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}'
388        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
389        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
390        payload = {
391            'replace_image':{
392                "token":image_token,
393                "width":img_property.get('width', None),
394                "height":img_property.get('height', None),
395                "align":img_property.get('align', None),
396            }
397        }
398        resp = request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
399        # 限制接口频率
400        time.sleep(0.34)
401        return resp
402
403    def add_permissions(self, document_id, member_id, permission='full_access', member_type='openchat', notify=False, check=True, access_token=None):
404        '''
405        member_id:
406            协作者 ID，与协作者 ID 类型需要对应
407        memeber_type:
408            email：飞书邮箱
409            openid：开放平台 ID
410            unionid：开放平台 UnionID
411            openchat：开放平台群组 ID
412            opendepartmentid：开放平台部门 ID。仅当使用 user_access_token 调用时有效
413            userid：用户自定义 ID
414            groupid：自定义用户组 ID
415            wikispaceid：知识空间 ID
416        permission:
417            view：可阅读角色
418            edit：可编辑角色
419            full_access：可管理角色
420        '''
421        url = self._host + f'/open-apis/drive/v1/permissions/{document_id}/members?need_notification={notify}&type=docx'
422        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
423        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
424        tmap = {"email":"user", "openchat":"chat"}
425        payload = {
426            "member_id": member_id,
427            "member_type": member_type,
428            "perm": permission,
429            "perm_type": "container",
430            "type": tmap.get(member_type, 'user'),
431        }
432        resp = None
433        try:
434            resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
435        except Exception as e:
436            if check:raise Exception(e)
437            else:print(e)
438        return resp
439
440    def upload_image(self, block_id, file_path, access_token=None):
441        file_path = os.path.abspath(file_path)
442        file_size = os.path.getsize(file_path)
443        url = self._host + f"open-apis/drive/v1/medias/upload_all"
444        form = {
445            'file_name': os.path.basename(file_path),
446            'parent_type': 'docx_image',
447            'parent_node': block_id,
448            'size': str(file_size),
449            'file': (open(file_path, 'rb'))
450        }  
451        multi_form = MultipartEncoder(form)
452        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
453        headers = {'Content-Type': multi_form.content_type, 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
454        response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=multi_form)
455        resp = {}
456        if bool(response.text) and response.text[0] == '{':
457            resp = response.json()
458        else:
459            pass
460        code = resp.get("code", -1)
461        if code == -1:
462            code = resp.get("StatusCode", -1)
463        if code == -1 and response.status_code != 200:
464            response.raise_for_status()
465        if code != 0:
466            raise LarkException(code=code, msg=resp.get("msg", ""))
467        token = None
468        if resp['code'] == 0:
469            token = resp['data']['file_token']
470        # 限制接口频率
471        time.sleep(0.34)
472        return token
473    
474    def delete_children_blocks(self, document_id, index_range, block_id=None, access_token=None):
475        '''
476        :param index_range:
477            删除的索引，下标从1开始，支持 Int | List
478            示例:
479                删除子块序列1到3
480                index_range=[1, 3]
481                删除子块1
482                index_range=1
483        '''
484        if not block_id:
485            block_id = document_id
486        if not isinstance(index_range, Iterable):
487            index_range = [index_range] * 2
488        if any([index <= 0 for index in index_range]):
489            raise ValueError('下标从1开始')
490        url = self._host + f'open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{block_id}/children/batch_delete'
491        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
492        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + access_token}
493        payload = {
494            'start_index':min(index_range)-1,
495            'end_index':max(index_range),
496        }
497        resp = request("DELETE", url, headers, payload)
498        # 限制接口频率
499        time.sleep(0.34)
500        return resp
501
502    def insert_image(self, document_id, image_path, block_id=None, replace=False):
503        if not os.path.exists(image_path):
504            print('image path not exists!')
505            return
506        img_block_id = self.createblocks(document_id, block(None, 27), block_id=block_id)[-1]
507        if replace:
508            self.delete_children_blocks(document_id, 1, block_id)
509        image_token = self.upload_image(img_block_id, image_path)
510        return self.updateblockimage(document_id, img_block_id, image_token)
511    
512    ############################### SHEET API ######################################
513
514    def update_permission(self, file_token, file_type="sheet"):
515        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/permissions/{file_token}/public?type={file_type}"
516        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
517        payload = {"link_share_entity": "tenant_editable"}
518        resp = request("PATCH", url, headers, payload)
519        return resp['data']
520
521    def find_cell(self, spreadsheet_token, sheet_id, find_str):
522        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v3/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/sheets/{sheet_id}/find"
523        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
524        payload = {"find_condition": {"range": sheet_id + "!A:E", "match_case": False, "match_entire_cell": False,
525                                      "search_by_regex": False, "include_formulas": False}, "find": find_str}
526        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
527        return resp['data']
528
529    def get_values_batch(self, spreadsheet_token, ranges, value_render="Formula"):
530        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/values_batch_get?" f"ranges={ranges}&valueRenderOption={value_render}"
531        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
532        payload = {"ranges": ranges, "valueRenderOption": "Formula"}
533        resp = request("GET", url, headers, payload)
534        return resp['data']
535
536    def update_values(self, spreadsheet_token, crange, values):
537        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/values"
538        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
539        payload = {"valueRange": {"range": crange, "values": values}}
540        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
541        return resp['data']
542
543    def set_cell_style(self, spreadsheet_token, crange, foreColor=None, backColor=None):
544        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/style"
545        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
546        style = {"formatter": "@", "vAlign": 1, "hAlign": 1, "foreColor": foreColor, "backColor": backColor}
547        payload = {"appendStyle": {"range": crange, "style": style}}
548        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
549        return resp['data']
550    
551    def batch_set_cell_style(self, spreadsheet_token, styles):
552        """
553        批量设置单元格样式，样式字典参考：https://open.feishu.cn/document/server-docs/docs/sheets-v3/data-operation/batch-set-cell-style#1b8abd5d
554        """
555        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/styles_batch_update"
556        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
557        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, {"data": styles})
558        return resp['data']
559
560    def insert_cell_image(self, spreadsheet_token, image_data):
561        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/values_image" % spreadsheet_token
562        headers = {'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
563        payload = {"range": image_data[0], "image": image_data[1], "name": image_data[2]}
564        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
565        return resp['data']
566
567    def merge_cells(self, spreadsheet_token, crange):
568        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/merge_cells" % spreadsheet_token
569        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
570        payload = {"range": crange, "mergeType": "MERGE_ALL"}
571        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
572        return resp['data']
573
574    def create_spreadsheet(self, foldertoken, title):
575        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v3/spreadsheets"
576        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
577        payload = {"title": title, "folder_token": foldertoken}
578        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
579        return resp['data']['spreadsheet']['spreadsheet_token'], resp['data']['spreadsheet']['url']
580
581    def get_first_sheetid(self, spreadsheet_token):
582        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/metainfo"
583        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
584        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
585        return resp['data']['sheets'][0]["sheetId"]
586
587    def get_sheets_info(self, spreadsheet_token):
588        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/metainfo"
589        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
590        resp = request("GET", url, headers)
591        return resp['data']['sheets']
592    
593    def set_dimension_properties(self, spreadsheet_token, dimension_set):
594        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/" + spreadsheet_token + "/dimension_range"
595        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
596        payload = {
597            "dimension":{
598                "sheetId":dimension_set['sheetId'],
599                "majorDimension":dimension_set['majorDimension'],
600                "startIndex":dimension_set['startIndex'],
601                "endIndex":dimension_set['endIndex']
602            },
603            "dimensionProperties":{
604                "visible":'true',
605                "fixedSize":dimension_set['fixedSize']
606            }
607        }
608        resp = request("PUT", url, headers, payload)
609        return resp['data']
610
611    def sheets_batch_update(self, spreadsheet_token, sheetid):
612        url = self._host + "/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/%s/sheets_batch_update" % spreadsheet_token
613        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
614        payload = {"requests": [
615            {"updateSheet": {"properties": {"sheetId": sheetid, "frozenColCount": 0, "frozenRowCount": 1}}}]}
616        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
617        return resp['data']
618
619    def media_download_image(self, file_token):
620        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/medias/{file_token}/download"
621        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
622        response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10)
623        response.raise_for_status()
624        cl = response.content
625        return cl
626
627    def upload_file_to_drive(self, file_path, parent_node=None, file_name=None):
628        prepare_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_prepare"
629        part_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_part"
630        finish_url = self._host + f"/open-apis/drive/v1/files/upload_finish"
631        if file_name is None:
632            file_name = os.path.basename(file_path)
633        part_size = 4194304
634        if parent_node is None:
635            parent_node = 'XKh7fHoDYlFprOdkcEQcgAuHnLh'
636
637        def cal_file_block(local_path):
638            result = []
639            with open(local_path, 'rb') as f:
640                index = 0
641                while True:
642                    chunk = f.read(part_size)
643                    if not chunk:
644                        break
645                    result.append(chunk)
646                    index += 1
647            return result
648
649        file_stat = os.stat(file_path)
650        payload = {'file_name': file_name, 'parent_type': 'explorer', 'parent_node': parent_node,
651                   'size': str(file_stat.st_size)}
652        headers = {'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
653        result = request("POST", prepare_url, headers=headers, data=payload)
654        upload_id = result['data']['upload_id']
655        block_num = result['data']['block_num']
656        block_size = result['data']['block_size']
657        blocks = cal_file_block(file_path)
658        for index, block in enumerate(blocks):
659            payload = {'upload_id': upload_id, 'seq': str(index), 'size': str(len(block)), 'file': block}
660            multi_form = MultipartEncoder(payload)
661            part_headers = headers.copy()
662            part_headers['Content-Type'] = multi_form.content_type
663            response = request("POST", part_url, part_headers, data=multi_form)
664        finish_payload = {'upload_id': upload_id, 'block_num': block_num}
665        response = request("POST", finish_url, headers, data=finish_payload)
666        return response['data']
667
668    def add_work_sheet(self, spreadsheet_token, title, index=0):
669        url = self._host + f"/open-apis/sheets/v2/spreadsheets/{spreadsheet_token}/sheets_batch_update"
670        headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + self.token}
671        payload = {"requests": [{"addSheet": {"properties": {"title": title, "index": index}}}]}
672        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
673        return resp['data']
674    
675
676
677    def create_numbered_headings(self, document_id: str, titles: list, 
678                                heading_level: int = 1, parent_block_id: str = None,
679                                bold: bool = True, access_token = None):
680        '''
681        插入带编号的标题块（支持heading1/heading2，自动显示在导航栏）
682        :param document_id: 文档ID
683        :param titles: 标题列表，如['第一章 概述', ...]
684        :param heading_level: 标题级别，1表示heading1，2表示heading2
685        :param parent_block_id: 父块ID（不传为根节点）
686        :param bold: 是否加粗
687        :param access_token: 访问令牌
688        :return: 插入的block节点列表
689        '''
690        # 验证标题级别
691        if heading_level not in [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]:
692            raise ValueError("heading_level must be 1、2、3、4、5")
693        
694        host = self._host
695        access_token = self.token if not access_token else access_token
696        parent_block_id = parent_block_id or document_id  # 根节点默认为文档ID
697        url = f"{host}/open-apis/docx/v1/documents/{document_id}/blocks/{parent_block_id}/children"
698        headers = {
699            "Content-Type": "application/json; charset=utf-8",
700            "Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}"
701        }
702        
703        children = []
704        for idx, title in enumerate(titles, 1):
705            # 根据标题级别设置block_type和对应字段
706            block_type = 3 if heading_level == 1 else 4
707            heading_field = "heading1" if heading_level == 1 else "heading2"
708            
709            children.append({
710                "block_type": block_type,
711                heading_field: {
712                    "elements": [
713                        {
714                            "text_run": {
715                                "content": f"{idx}. {title}",
716                                "text_element_style": {
717                                    "bold": bold
718                                }
719                            }
720                        }
721                    ]
722                }
723            })
724        
725        payload = {
726            "index": -1,
727            "children": children
728        }
729        
730        resp = request("POST", url, headers, payload)
731        return resp['data']['children']

item.title: 画图
item.description:
matplotlib
#

</> python 
 1import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
 2def draw(x:list, y:list, titles, fileName, output='./'
 3                   ,lineColor='blue',marker='.',markerfacecolor='white',markeredgecolor='#fd5e0f',fillBetColor='white'):
 4    '''绘图的主要方法
 5
 6    :param x: x轴
 7    :param y: y轴
 8    :param titles: 图片内部标题
 9    :param fileName: 图片文件名称
10    '''
11    fig,ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(20, 6))
12    ax.set_facecolor('white')
13    plt.grid(which='both', color='grey', linestyle='--', alpha=0.5)
14    plt.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False
15    plt.rcParams['figure.max_open_warning'] = 30
16    plt.plot(x, y,color=lineColor,marker=marker, markerfacecolor=markerfacecolor, markeredgecolor=markeredgecolor)
17    plt.fill_between(x,y,color=fillBetColor)
18    plt.title(label=titles, fontsize=23, loc='left')
19    fig.subplots_adjust(left=0.03, right=1)
20    ax.margins(x=0)
21    plt.xticks(fontsize=10)
22    plt.yticks(fontsize=10)
23    x_num = len(x)//10
24    x_coordinate = x[::x_num]
25    plt.xticks(x_coordinate, x_coordinate)
26    filePath = os.path.join(output, fileName)
27    plt.savefig(f"{filePath}.png", dpi=300)

item.title: LinuxHttp工具
item.description:
wget
#

wget获取指定ip路由下的全部文件
-r：递归
--no-parent：无父目录
--accept：接收文件，支持通配符
--reject：拒绝文件，支持通配符
-P：指定下载路径

</> shell 
1wget -r --no-parent --accept "*.zip*" --reject "*.html" ip:port -P ./download/

Http文件服务器
#

  1. python3 http server模块快速启动
    python3 -m http.server 8000 --directory /path/
</> console 
1Serving HTTP on 0.0.0.0 port 8000 (http://0.0.0.0:8000/) ...

优点：快速
缺点：不能直观看到本地ip

  1. python3 代码
</> python 
 1import socket
 2import sys
 3import http.server  
 4import socketserver 
 5import traceback
 6
 7class Handler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler): 
 8    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
 9        super().__init__(*args, directory=target, **kwargs)
10    
11    def end_headers(self):
12        self.send_header('Connection', 'close')
13        super().end_headers()
14
15def get_local_ip() -> str:
16    try:
17        s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
18        s.connect(("8.8.8.8", 80))  
19        local_ip = s.getsockname()[0] 
20        s.close() 
21        return local_ip
22    except Exception as e:
23        raise Exception(f"无法获取IP: {str(e)}\n请检查网络环境")
24
25if __name__ == '__main__':
26    local_ip = get_local_ip()
27    target = ''
28    try:
29        target = sys.argv[1]
30    except:
31        target = "."
32    
33    with socketserver.ThreadingTCPServer(("", 0), Handler) as httpd:
34        port = httpd.server_address[1] 
35        print(f"Serving HTTP on http://{local_ip}:{port}/")
36        try:
37            httpd.serve_forever()
38        except:
39            print(traceback.format_exc())
40        finally:
41            httpd.server_close()
42    print('exit.')
</> shell 
1python3 autofileserver.py /path/

优点：快速、直观看到ip:port

item.title: LearnHugo250804
item.description:
设置code-header.language-label点击折叠
#

  1. 设置悬停spacing扩展效果
</> css 
 1.language-brackets {
 2    /* 全属性切换过渡动画效果 */
 3    transition: all 0.3s ease; 
 4}
 5/* 悬停间距扩展，颜色高亮 */
 6.language-label:hover .language-brackets {
 7    letter-spacing: 3px;
 8    color: var(--code-header-hover-color);
 9}
10.language-label:hover .language-name {
11    color: var(--code-header-hover-color);
12}
  1. js设置点击label切换chroma.collapsed
</> javascript 
 1    document.querySelectorAll('.language-label').forEach(button => {
 2      button.addEventListener('click', () => {
 3        const codeBlock = button.closest('.code-block-wrapper');
 4        const chroma = codeBlock?.querySelector('pre.chroma');
 5        if (chroma) {
 6          chroma.classList.toggle('collapsed');
 7        }
 8        else console.error('chroma折叠失败');
 9      });
10    });
  1. 设置pre.chroma.collapsed折叠样式
</> css 
1pre.chroma.collapsed{
2  /* 折叠方法：设置高度为0 */
3  max-height: 0 !important;
4  /* 去除溢出拖动条 */
5  overflow: hidden !important;
6  /* 去除顽固padding */
7  padding: 0 !important;
8}

设置代码块换行按钮功能
#

  1. 核心样式方案：把ln设置固定宽度，cl设置为block，固定左侧间距
</> css 
 1pre.chroma .ln {
 2  float: left;
 3  /* 设置行号区域的宽度 */
 4  width: 20px;
 5  text-align: right;
 6  margin-right: 10px;
 7  user-select: none;  /* 禁止行号被选中 */
 8}
 9
10pre.chroma .cl {
11  display: block;
12  margin-left: 30px; /* 与行号宽度一致 */
13}
14
15pre.chroma.wrap-lines .cl {
16  display: block;
17  margin-left: 30px; /* 与行号宽度一致 */
18  white-space: pre-wrap !important;
19}
  1. js代码
</> javascript 
 1  document.querySelectorAll('.code-block-wrapper').forEach(wrapper => {
 2      // 为每个代码块创建换行状态存储
 3      const preElement = wrapper.querySelector('pre.chroma');
 4      if (preElement) {
 5          // 默认从 localStorage 读取用户偏好
 6          const wrapEnabled = localStorage.getItem('codeWrapEnabled') === 'true';
 7          if (wrapEnabled) {
 8              preElement.classList.add('wrap-lines');
 9              const wrapButton = wrapper.querySelector('.wrap-button');
10              if (wrapButton) {
11                  wrapButton.classList.add('active');
12                  const span = wrapButton.querySelector('span');
13                  if (span) span.textContent = '不换行';
14              }
15          }
16      }
17  });
18  // 换行按钮功能
19  document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
20      if (e.target.closest('.wrap-button')) {
21          const button = e.target.closest('.wrap-button');
22          const codeBlock = button.closest('.code-block-wrapper');
23          const preElement = codeBlock.querySelector('pre.chroma');
24          
25          if (preElement) {
26              preElement.classList.toggle('wrap-lines');
27              button.classList.toggle('active');
28              
29              // 保存用户偏好
30              const isNowWrapped = preElement.classList.contains('wrap-lines');
31              localStorage.setItem('codeWrapEnabled', isNowWrapped.toString());
32              
33              // 更新按钮文本
34              const span = button.querySelector('span');
35              if (span) {
36                  span.textContent = isNowWrapped ? '换行' : '不换行';
37              }
38          }
39      }
40  });

item.title: 时间字符串
item.description:
1. datetime系列
#

一般来说用from datetime import datetime

1. .fromtimestamp
#

接收一个浮点ts参数，返回datetime结构体，可接续使用datetime内置方法
经典场景：ts -> 格式化timestr
datetime.fromtimestamp(ts).strftime('%Y-%m-%d-%H:%M:%S')

</> python 
1def ts2timestr(ts:float) -> str:
2    return datetime.fromtimestamp(ts).strftime('%Y-%m-%d-%H:%M:%S')

2. .strptime
#

接收1. 格式化timestr, 2. 格式format；返回datetime结构体(接续使用其他内置方法)
经典场景：格式化timestr -> ts
datetime.strptime(timestr, pattern).timestamp()

</> python 
1def timestr2ts(timestr, pattern='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'):
2    return datetime.strptime(timestr, pattern).timestamp()

3. .replace
#

  1. python hint
</> python 
 1(method) def replace(
 2    year: SupportsIndex = ...,
 3    month: SupportsIndex = ...,
 4    day: SupportsIndex = ...,
 5    hour: SupportsIndex = ...,
 6    minute: SupportsIndex = ...,
 7    second: SupportsIndex = ...,
 8    microsecond: SupportsIndex = ...,
 9    tzinfo: _TzInfo | None = ...,
10    *,
11    fold: int = ...
12) -> datetime

一般使用关键字参数指定参数传参：
.replace(hour=23, minute=59, second=59, microsecond=0)

item.title: Requests
item.description:
requests.request方法
#

基础用法：

</> python 
1requests.request(method, url, headers, json)
2requests.request(method, url, headers, data)

参数json和data的区别：
json为字典对象
data为字典字符串，需要使用json.dumps(payload)转换为字符串

item.title: 压缩解压
item.description:
解压
#

基础
#

解压zip
模块：zipfile

</> python 
1import zipfile
2with zipfile.ZipFile(fp, 'r') as zip_ref:
3    zip_ref.extractall()

递归解压zip
#

模块：zipfile, pathlib
zipfile.ZipFile.extract(fi, ep)方法逐个判断fi.filename是否匹配zip文件，匹配则进入递归解压

</> python 
 1import zipfile
 2from pathlib import Path
 3from os.path import join
 4def r_unzip(fp:Path, ep:str='./unzip') -> int:
 5    # 统计解压的zip文件数
 6    c = 1
 7    try:
 8        extr_path = join(ep, fp.stem.split('.zip')[0])
 9        with zipfile.ZipFile(fp, 'r') as zip_ref:
10            for finfo in zip_ref.infolist():
11                zip_ref.extract(finfo, extr_path)
12                extr_file = Path(join(extr_path, finfo.filename))
13                if extr_file.match("*.zip"):
14                    c += r_unzip(extr_file, extr_path)
15    except Exception as e:
16        print(f'file error, pass:{fp}, error msg:{e}')
17    finally:
18        return c

item.title: 读日志
item.description:
读取单个日志
#

1. 读全部日志
#

处理方法：直接读取整体文件内容，或者逐行读取，返回lines列表

</> python 
1def readlog(logfile):
2    with open(logfile, 'r') as f:
3        return f.read() or f.readlines()

2. 读部分日志（限定时间范围）
#

需要考虑：日志文件过大，逐行判断时间戳性能过低
处理方法：

  1. 二分查找起始位置
</> python 
 1import datetime
 2import os
 3
 4def bs_read_log(logfile, st, et):
 5    text = []
 6    file_size = os.path.getsize(logfile)
 7    
 8    with open(logfile, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 9        # 二分查找定位起始位置
10        low, high = 0, file_size
11        start_pos = 0
12        
13        while low < high:
14            mid = (low + high) // 2
15            f.seek(mid)
16            f.readline()  # 移动到完整行首
17            line = f.readline()
18            
19            if not line:
20                break
21                
22            line_tm = logline_time(line)
23            if line_tm is None:  # 跳过无效行
24                continue
25                
26            if line_tm < st:
27                low = mid + 1
28                start_pos = f.tell()  # 记录最后有效位置
29            else:
30                high = mid
31        
32        # 定位到起始区域
33        f.seek(start_pos)
34        while True:
35            line = f.readline()
36            if not line:
37                break
38                
39            line_tm = logline_time(line)
40            if line_tm is None:
41                continue
42                
43            if line_tm > et:
44                break
45                
46            if st <= line_tm <= et:
47                text.append(line.strip())
48    
49    return text
  1. 二分查找起始位置 + 分块检测日志时间
</> python 
 1def readlog(logfile, st, et):
 2    # 入参检测
 3    if st > et:
 4        return None
 5    # 根据日志大小设置分块大小
 6    chunksize = 1024
 7    # chunk值初始设置为chunksize 大小，可以在读第一行日志时先判断日志时间是否在(st, et)区间，不在即可直接退出
 8    chunk = 1024
 9    text = []
10    file_size = os.path.getsize(logfile)
11    with open(logfile, 'rb') as f:
12        # 二分查找定位起始位置
13        low, high = 0, file_size
14        start_pos = 0
15        
16        while low < high:
17            mid = (low + high) // 2
18            f.seek(mid)
19            f.readline()  # 移动到完整行首
20            line = f.readline()
21            
22            if not line:
23                break
24                
25            line_tm = logline_time(line)
26            if line_tm is None:  # 跳过无效行
27                continue
28                
29            if line_tm < st:
30                low = mid + 1
31                start_pos = f.tell()  # 记录最后有效位置
32            else:
33                high = mid
34
35        # 定位到起始区域
36        f.seek(start_pos)
37        while(line:=f.readline().decode(errors='ignore')):
38            chunk += 1
39            if chunk >= chunksize:
40                chunk = 1
41                if (tm:=logline_time(line)) != None and tm > et:
42                    break
43
44            text.append(line)
45
46    # 如果追求读取范围结束时间准确性，可以从后往前逐行清除区间外日志，不追求结束时间准确性可以不做
47    while logline_time(text[-1]) > et:
48        text.pop(-1)
49    return text

3. 反向读日志
#

思路：定位到文件尾，逐行读取
核心：

item.title: 日志分析
item.description:
纯python处理
#

支持关键字正则表达式组合，逐行后处理，跨平台兼容

日志关键字处理
#

需求：

  1. 1次遍历，O(n)
  2. 多关键字(支持regex pattern)
  3. 关键字一对一自定义处理方法解耦
  4. 处理结果统计，每个关键字的成功/失败处理量+处理总量

例子：
找到日志中包含kwA的日志，执行dealA(line) -> pass/fail处理方法
找到日志中包含kwB的日志，执行dealB(line) -> pass/fail处理方法
…

思路：

  1. 每行日志查询全部关键字，有关键字出现，进入deallog回调
  2. 通过deal_log回调函数，在回调内部区分kw，执行不同逻辑
  3. 结束时输出关键字相关处理总量
</> python 
 1import re
 2from collection import defaultdict
 3def keywords_check(checktitle, text, checklist, deal_log=(lambda pt, line:True)) -> int, str:
 4    # checklist 入参多类型支持(dict, list)
 5    checklist = list(dict.fromkeys(checklist))
 6    # 计数器
 7    kw_counter, err_counter = defaultdict(int), defaultdict(int)
 8    for line in text:
 9        found = [pattern for pattern in checklist if re.search(pattern, line) is not None]
10        if not found:continue
11        for pattern in found:
12            kw_counter[pattern] += 1
13            if False == deal_log(pattern, line):
14                err_counter[pattern] += 1
15    msg = "{} done, total {} records, {} errors\n{}".format(
16        checktitle
17        , (kw_sum:=sum(kw_counter.values()))
18        , sum(err_counter.values())
19        , "".join(["[{}]: {} records, {} errors\n".format(
20            pattern
21            , kw_counter.get(pattern, 0)
22            , err_counter.get(pattern, 0)
23            ) for pattern in checklist
24        ])
25    )
26    return kw_sum, msg
27
28checklist = {
29    'pt1':r"^kwA*$",
30    'pt2':r"^kwB*$",
31    'pt3':r"^kwC*$",
32}
33def deal_log(pt, line):
34    if pt == checklist['pt1']:
35        return dealA(line)
36    elif pt == checklist['pt2']:
37        return dealB(line)
38    elif pt == checklist['pt3']:
39        return dealC(line)
40    else:
41        return False
42
43keywords_check('check keywords', checklist.values(), deal_log)

数据收集
#

可以使用上面的keywords_check方法，通过自定义deal_log方法收集数据
完成数据收集之后自定义数据分析方法

item.title: 脚本日志
item.description:
print
#

纯print输出
#

通过sys.stdout/sys.stderr重定向输出至文件

</> python 
 1import sys
 2class Tee:
 3    """同时重定向 stdout 和 stderr 到文件和终端"""
 4    def __init__(self, filename):
 5        self.file = open(filename, 'a')  # 追加模式
 6        self.stdout = sys.stdout
 7        self.stderr = sys.stderr
 8
 9    def write(self, message):
10        self.file.write(message)
11        self.stdout.write(message)  # 标准输出到终端
12        self.file.flush()          # 确保实时写入文件
13
14    def flush(self):
15        self.file.flush()
16
17# 脚本日志重定向
18sys.stdout = Tee(f"{__file__.split('.')[0]}.log")
19sys.stderr = Tee(f"{__file__.split('.')[0]}.log")

1from datetime import datetime
2class Logger:
3    def now(self):return datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%f")
4    def info(self, msg):print(self.now() + ' - INFO - ' + msg)
5    def warning(self, msg):print(self.now() + ' - WARN - ' + msg)
6    def error(self, msg):print(self.now() + ' - ERROR - ' + msg)
7
8logger = Logger()

logging

通用代码

 1import logging
 2import os
 3from datetime import datetime
 4
 5def setup_logger(name, log_level=logging.INFO, log_file_path=None):
 6    logger = logging.getLogger(name)
 7    logger.setLevel(log_level)
 8    formatter = logging.Formatter(
 9        '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
10        datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'
11    )
12    console_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
13    console_handler.setFormatter(formatter)
14    logger.addHandler(console_handler)
15    
16    if log_file_path is None:
17        return logger
18
19    file_handler = logging.FileHandler(log_file_path)
20        
21    file_handler.setFormatter(formatter)
22    logger.addHandler(file_handler)
23    return logger

场景 处理方式 示例

思路：retry变量控制
基本写法：

</> python 
 1def process_wp(retry=3):
 2    e = None
 3    res = None
 4    while retry:
 5        try:
 6            res = might_err_process()
 7        except:
 8            print(f'retry {retry}...')
 9            e = traceback.format_exc()
10            retry -= 1
11            # 按需等待
12            time.sleep(0.1)
13    else:
14        raise Exception(str(e))
15    return res

item.title: Linux文件读写
item.description:
核心思想
#

一切皆文件（Everything is a File），提供了一套统一的接口 (open(), read(), write(), close(), ioctl() 等系统调用) 来操作各种资源，极大地简化了程序设计。

不仅指普通的文本文件、二进制可执行文件、图片、视频等，还包括：

  • 硬件设备： 硬盘 (/dev/sda1)、键盘 (/dev/input)、显示器 (/dev/fb0)、声卡 (/dev/snd)、甚至内存 (/dev/mem) 都被表示为文件。对这些“设备文件”的读写操作实际上是与硬件交互。

  • 进程信息： 正在运行的程序（进程）的信息和控制接口可以通过 /proc 文件系统访问（如 /proc/1234 对应 PID 为 1234 的进程）。

  • 系统信息和配置： /sys 文件系统暴露内核参数、硬件信息和配置选项。

  • 网络套接字： 网络通信的端点。

  • 管道： 进程间通信的通道。

特性 普通文件 管道(Pipe) Socket(TCP)
打开方式 路径直接打开 pipe()系统调用 socket()+bind/connect
数据存储 持久化存储 内存缓冲区 网络传输
访问模式 随机访问 顺序访问 顺序访问
生命周期 显式创建/删除 进程结束自动销毁 连接关闭即失效
进程通信 不支持进程间通信 支持相关进程通信 支持跨网络通信
阻塞行为 通常非阻塞 读空阻塞/写满阻塞 默认阻塞

1. 普通文件
#

代码通用实现
#

1. python
#

  1. 基本方法：with open(fp, mode)
    示例
</> python 
 1with open('text.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:  # 'w' 覆盖写
 2    f.write("Hello Python!\n")
 3    f.writelines(["Line 1\n", "Line 2\n"])  # 写入多行
 4
 5with open('text.txt', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
 6    content = f.read()  # 一次性读取
 7    
 8with open('text.txt', 'r') as f:
 9    lines = f.readlines()  # 返回列表
10
11# ========== 二进制文件读写 ==========
12data = b'\x48\x65\x6C\x6C\x6F\x21'  # "Hello!" 的二进制
13with open('binary.bin', 'wb') as f:  # 'wb' 二进制写
14    f.write(data)
15
16with open('binary.bin', 'rb') as f:
17    binary_content = f.read()
18    print("二进制内容:", binary_content)  # b'Hello!'
19    print("解码为字符串:", binary_content.decode('utf-8'))

2. c++
#

  1. 基本方法：fstream
    1. 读：std::ifstream
    2. 写：std::ofstream
  2. 注：创建流对象后需要手动关闭
  3. 示例
</> c++ 
 1#include <iostream>
 2#include <fstream>
 3#include <vector>
 4#include <string>
 5
 6int main() {
 7    // ========== 文本文件读写 ==========
 8    // 写入文本文件
 9    std::ofstream textOut("text.txt");
10    if (textOut.is_open()) {
11        textOut << "Hello C++!\n";
12        textOut << "Line 1\nLine 2\n";
13        textOut.close();
14        std::cout << "文本写入成功" << std::endl;
15    } else {
16        std::cerr << "文本文件打开失败" << std::endl;
17    }
18
19    // 读取文本文件
20    std::ifstream textIn("text.txt");
21    if (textIn.is_open()) {
22        std::string line;
23        std::cout << "文本内容:" << std::endl;
24        while (std::getline(textIn, line)) {  // 逐行读取
25            std::cout << line << std::endl;
26        }
27        textIn.close();
28    } else {
29        std::cerr << "文本文件打开失败" << std::endl;
30    }
31
32    // ========== 二进制文件读写 ==========
33    // 写入二进制文件
34    std::ofstream binOut("binary.bin", std::ios::binary);
35    char data[] = {0x48, 0x65, 0x6C, 0x6C, 0x6F, 0x21}; // "Hello!"
36    if (binOut.is_open()) {
37        binOut.write(data, sizeof(data));
38        binOut.close();
39        std::cout << "二进制写入成功" << std::endl;
40    } else {
41        std::cerr << "二进制文件打开失败" << std::endl;
42    }
43
44    // 读取二进制文件
45    std::ifstream binIn("binary.bin", std::ios::binary);
46    if (binIn.is_open()) {
47        // 获取文件大小
48        binIn.seekg(0, std::ios::end);
49        size_t size = binIn.tellg();
50        binIn.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
51
52        // 读取到vector
53        std::vector<char> buffer(size);
54        binIn.read(buffer.data(), size);
55        binIn.close();
56
57        std::cout << "二进制内容: ";
58        for (char c : buffer) std::cout << c; // 输出 "Hello!"
59        std::cout << std::endl;
60    } else {
61        std::cerr << "二进制文件打开失败" << std::endl;
62    }
63
64    return 0;
65}

3. golang
#

  1. 基本方法：os
    1. 读：
      1. 整体读取：os.ReadFile
      2. 逐行读取：
        1. os.Open
        2. bufio.NewScanner
    2. 写：os.WriteFile
</> golang 
 1package main
 2
 3import (
 4	"fmt"
 5	"io"
 6	"os"
 7    "bufio"
 8)
 9
10func main() {
11	textContent := "Hello Go!\nLine 1\nLine 2\n"
12	err := os.WriteFile("text.txt", []byte(textContent), 0644) // 覆盖写入
13	if err != nil {
14		fmt.Println("文本写入失败:", err)
15	} else {
16		fmt.Println("文本写入成功")
17	}
18
19	data, err := os.ReadFile("text.txt") // 一次性读取
20	if err != nil {
21		fmt.Println("文本读取失败:", err)
22	} else {
23		fmt.Println("文本内容:\n", string(data))
24	}
25
26	// 逐行读取（使用 bufio）
27	file, err := os.Open("text.txt")
28	if err != nil {
29		fmt.Println("文件打开失败:", err)
30		return
31	}
32	defer file.Close()
33
34	fmt.Println("逐行读取:")
35	scanner := bufio.NewScanner(file)
36	for scanner.Scan() {
37		fmt.Println(scanner.Text()) // 输出每一行
38	}
39
40	// ========== 二进制文件读写 ==========
41	binaryData := []byte{0x48, 0x65, 0x6C, 0x6C, 0x6F, 0x21} // "Hello!"
42	err = os.WriteFile("binary.bin", binaryData, 0644)
43	if err != nil {
44		fmt.Println("二进制写入失败:", err)
45	} else {
46		fmt.Println("二进制写入成功")
47	}
48
49	binContent, err := os.ReadFile("binary.bin")
50	if err != nil {
51		fmt.Println("二进制读取失败:", err)
52	} else {
53		fmt.Println("二进制内容:", binContent)      // [72 101 108 108 111 33]
54		fmt.Println("解码为字符串:", string(binContent)) // "Hello!"
55	}
56
57	// 大文件分块读取
58	largeFile, err := os.Open("largefile.bin")
59	if err != nil {
60		fmt.Println("大文件打开失败:", err)
61		return
62	}
63	defer largeFile.Close()
64
65	buffer := make([]byte, 1024) // 1KB缓冲区
66	for {
67		n, err := largeFile.Read(buffer)
68		if err == io.EOF {
69			break // 文件结束
70		}
71		if err != nil {
72			fmt.Println("读取错误:", err)
73			break
74		}
75		fmt.Printf("读取 %d 字节\n", n)
76		// 处理 buffer[:n]
77	}
78}

2. 管道
#

代码实现
#

1. python
#

</> python 
 1import os
 2r, w = os.pipe()
 3pid = os.fork()
 4if pid == 0:  # Child
 5    os.close(w)
 6    data = os.read(r, 100)
 7    print("Pipe read:", data.decode())
 8    os._exit(0)
 9else:  # Parent
10    os.close(r)
11    os.write(w, b"Pipe message")
12    os.wait()

2. c++
#

</> c++ 
 1#include <iostream>
 2#include <fstream>
 3#include <unistd.h>
 4#include <sys/wait.h>
 5#include <sys/socket.h>
 6#include <netinet/in.h>
 7
 8int main() {
 9    int fd[2]; pipe(fd);
10    if (fork() == 0) {  // Child
11        close(fd[1]); 
12        char buf[100];
13        read(fd[0], buf, sizeof(buf));
14        std::cout << "Pipe read: " << buf << std::endl;
15        exit(0);
16    } else {  // Parent
17        close(fd[0]);
18        write(fd[1], "Pipe message", 13);
19        wait(nullptr);
20    }
21}

3. golang
#

</> golang 
 1package main
 2
 3import (
 4	"fmt"
 5	"io"
 6	"net"
 7)
 8func main() {
 9
10	r, w, _ := os.Pipe()
11	go func() {
12		w.Write([]byte("Pipe message"))
13		w.Close()
14	}()
15	pipeData, _ := io.ReadAll(r)
16	fmt.Println("Pipe read:", string(pipeData))
17}

3. 网络套接字socket
#

代码实现
#

1.python
#

</> python 
 1
 2import socket
 3# Server
 4srv = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
 5srv.bind(('127.0.0.1', 12345))
 6srv.listen(1)
 7# Client
 8cli = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
 9cli.connect(('127.0.0.1', 12345))
10# Accept and send
11conn, _ = srv.accept()
12conn.send(b"Socket data")
13print("Socket read:", cli.recv(100).decode())
14cli.close(); srv.close()

2. c++
#

</> c++ 
 1#include <iostream>
 2#include <fstream>
 3#include <unistd.h>
 4#include <sys/wait.h>
 5#include <sys/socket.h>
 6#include <netinet/in.h>
 7
 8int main() {
 9    // Server setup
10    int srv_fd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
11    sockaddr_in addr = {AF_INET, htons(12345), INADDR_ANY};
12    bind(srv_fd, (sockaddr*)&addr, sizeof(addr));
13    listen(srv_fd, 1);
14    // Client connect
15    int cli_fd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
16    connect(cli_fd, (sockaddr*)&addr, sizeof(addr));
17    // Communication
18    int conn_fd = accept(srv_fd, nullptr, nullptr);
19    send(conn_fd, "Socket data", 12, 0);
20    char buffer[100];
21    recv(cli_fd, buffer, sizeof(buffer), 0);
22    std::cout << "Socket read: " << buffer << std::endl;
23    close(cli_fd); close(srv_fd);
24}

3. golang
#

</> golang 
 1package main
 2
 3import (
 4	"fmt"
 5	"io"
 6	"net"
 7)
 8func main() {
 9	// Server
10	listener, _ := net.Listen("tcp", "127.0.0.1:12345")
11	go func() {
12		conn, _ := listener.Accept()
13		conn.Write([]byte("Socket data"))
14		conn.Close()
15	}()
16	// Client
17	conn, _ := net.Dial("tcp", "127.0.0.1:12345")
18	sockData, _ := io.ReadAll(conn)
19	fmt.Println("Socket read:", string(sockData))
20}

item.title: Hugo学习250728
item.description:
1. 可折叠列表 HTML5 标签，折叠内容无法支持原生markdown语法
#

  1. config.yaml中配置，允许渲染 HTML 标签
</> yaml 
1markup:
2  goldmark:
3    renderer:
4      unsafe: true
  1. 使用原生html5 details标签
</> html 
1<details>
2  <summary>点击展开查看详情</summary>
3  
4  这里是隐藏的内容，支持 **Markdown** 格式：
5  
6  - 列表项1
7  - 列表项2
8  - [链接](https://example.com)
9</details>
效果：

这里是隐藏的内容，支持 Markdown 格式：

  • 列表项1
  • 列表项2
  • 链接
本质是隐藏细节
  1. 嵌套
一级折叠标题

这是一级内容…

二级折叠标题 
<details>
  <summary>三级折叠标题</summary>
  
  - 这是三级列表
  - 支持 Markdown
  - 可以无限嵌套（但建议不超过3-4层）
</details>
  • 一级内容中的普通列表
  • 也可以混合使用

似乎只能嵌套两层

item.title: 元类MetaClass
item.description:
元类作用时机
当使用此元类定义新类时（如 class MyClass(metaclass=StaticMethodMeta)），元类的 __new__ 方法会在类创建时被调用。

利用元类改变类特性 -> 创建一个成员函数自动转换为静态成员函数的类

</> python 
 1class StaticMethodMeta(type):
 2    def __new__(cls, name, bases, namespace):
 3        for attr_name, attr_value in namespace.items():
 4            if callable(attr_value) and not attr_name.startswith('__'):
 5                namespace[attr_name] = staticmethod(attr_value)
 6        return super().__new__(cls, name, bases, namespace)
 7
 8class tool(metaclass=StaticMethodMeta):
 9    # 静态成员没有self参数
10    def tool1(p1, p2):
11        pass

item.title: hugo学习250723
item.description:
hugo工作流程
#

  1. url route -> 确定页面类型

hugo页面类型推断
#

(1) 文件系统结构
#

Hugo 会扫描 content/ 目录下的内容文件（如 .md 或 .html），根据文件的位置和命名规则自动推断页面类型：

</> text 
1_index.md → 列表页（kind: "section" 或 kind: "home"）
2
3普通内容文件（如 post.md） → 单页（kind: "page" 或 kind: "single"）
4
5分类/标签页 → 分类列表（kind: "taxonomy" 或 kind: "term"）

(2) 页面 Front Matter
#

通过 Front Matter 中的 type 或 layout 字段可手动指定类型（覆盖自动推断）：

item.title: 用户态、内核态内存空间
item.description:
用户态、内核态指内存空间，CPU的各寄存器则是CPU硬件，不属于内存部分，仅在需要存档备份数据时保存至（用户态/内核态）内存
1、 进程内核栈
每个进程都有自己独立的位于内核空间的内核栈，保存进程在内核态执行的函数调用栈、局部变量、寄存器状态等数据

linux系统切换进程时会切换

  • 内核栈
    将 CPU 的栈指针寄存器 (SP/ESP/RSP, x86架构) 从指向进程 A 的内核栈顶部，修改为指向进程 B 的内核栈顶部
  • 页目录
    系统切换进程时找到进程的页目录的物理基地址（mm->pgd指针），写入CR3(x86)/TTBR0(ARM)寄存

2、进程页目录
存储在物理内存中，进程在创建时，系统创建mm_struct结构，用mm->pgd指针保存页目录物理基地址（用来在系统切换进程时找到进程的页目录的物理基地址，写入CR3(x86)/TTBR0(ARM)寄存器，完成进程上下文切换）
页目录包含进程使用的全部内存的虚拟内存地址->物理内存地址的映射关系
3、进程硬件上下文
运行时各寄存器的中间结果、比如PC程序计数器（下一条指令地址）、SP栈指针寄存器（当前调用栈顶）
切换时，这些数据被保存到进程内核栈中

4、线程切换总是发生在同一个进程（同一个虚拟地址空间）内的线程之间。不同进程的线程之间的切换，本质上是通过上层的进程切换完成的
5、切换线程时只切换线程内核栈，同样CPU栈指针寄存器从指向线程A的内核栈顶->B的内核栈顶。因为同属一个进程，所以不切换页目录，也即使用同一虚拟内存空间

6、进程、线程切换都依赖内核调度器，抢占式调度（时间片、中断）
7、协程切换只在用户态通过程序本身调度切换，主动让出，显式让出控制权
8、

进程 线程 协程
切换内核栈、页目录 切换内核栈 仅切换寄存器状态

9、用户态进程与内核态进程 全双工通信 -> Netlink Socket

相比传统 IPC (syscall, ioctl, procfs)，Netlink 具有显著优势：易于扩展、异步通信、完美支持内核模块、强大的组播能力、真正的全双工通信、开发者友好的标准 Socket API。

单播回显: 用户请求->内核处理->内核响应的双向通信模式
内核主动组播: 内核主动向多个订阅进程广播事件的能力

netlink属于无连接协议（无连接协议是一种通信协议，其中每个数据包的处理都是独立的，不需要在发送数据之前建立连接）

item.title: 闭包
item.description:
在创建时封装当时状态，并使当时的状态生存周期延长至与闭包生存周期一致
闭包思想产物：
1. python装饰器
2. 回调函数
3. 函数工厂
4. 惰性求值
…

典型用法
#

1. python装饰器
#

</> python 
1def execute(f):
2    f()
3
4@execute
5def execute_when_defined():
6    print('executed')

2. 函数工厂
#

  1. 保存调用函数工厂时的参数
  2. 调用生成的函数时，使用函数工厂创建函数时的参数上下文

示例
#

  1. python api函数工厂
</> python 
1def get_table_grids_wp(cli:Client, docid):
2    def func(tableid):
3        return [c['children'][0] for c in cli.fetchblocks(docid, tableid)['data']['items']]
4    return func
5
6get_table_grids = get_table_grids_wp(cli, docid)
7get_table_grids(tid)
  1. go 基础函数工厂
</> go 
 1package main
 2
 3import "fmt"
 4
 5// 函数工厂：返回一个加法函数
 6func makeAdder(addend int) func(int) int {
 7    return func(x int) int {
 8        return x + addend
 9    }
10}
11
12func main() {
13    add5 := makeAdder(5)  // 创建一个加5的函数
14    add10 := makeAdder(10) // 创建一个加10的函数
15    
16    fmt.Println(add5(3))   // 输出: 8 (3 + 5)
17    fmt.Println(add10(3))  // 输出: 13 (3 + 10)
18}
  1. go 中间件工厂
  2. 带配置的函数工厂
</> go 
 1package main
 2
 3import "fmt"
 4
 5type GreeterConfig struct {
 6    Prefix string
 7    Suffix string
 8}
 9
10// 创建问候函数
11func NewGreeter(config GreeterConfig) func(string) string {
12    return func(name string) string {
13        return fmt.Sprintf("%s, %s%s", config.Prefix, name, config.Suffix)
14    }
15}
16
17func main() {
18    friendlyGreeter := NewGreeter(GreeterConfig{
19        Prefix: "Hello",
20        Suffix: "! Welcome!",
21    })
22    
23    formalGreeter := NewGreeter(GreeterConfig{
24        Prefix: "Dear",
25        Suffix: ", we are pleased to meet you",
26    })
27    
28    fmt.Println(friendlyGreeter("Alice")) // 输出: Hello, Alice! Welcome!
29    fmt.Println(formalGreeter("Bob"))    // 输出: Dear, Bob, we are pleased to meet you
30}
  1. 缓存函数工厂
</> go 
 1package main
 2
 3import "fmt"
 4
 5// 创建带缓存的函数
 6func makeCachedFunc(fn func(int) int) func(int) int {
 7    cache := make(map[int]int)
 8    return func(x int) int {
 9        if result, found := cache[x]; found {
10            fmt.Printf("Cache hit for %d\n", x)
11            return result
12        }
13        result := fn(x)
14        cache[x] = result
15        fmt.Printf("Calculated for %d\n", x)
16        return result
17    }
18}
19
20func expensiveCalculation(x int) int {
21    // 模拟耗时计算
22    return x * x
23}
24
25func main() {
26    cachedCalc := makeCachedFunc(expensiveCalculation)
27    
28    fmt.Println(cachedCalc(5)) // 输出: Calculated for 5 \n 25
29    fmt.Println(cachedCalc(5)) // 输出: Cache hit for 5 \n 25
30}

item.title: Hugo理解
item.description:
hugo工作流程
#

  1. 导入主题后，完成自定义配置和资源
</> markdown 
 1- config yaml/toml/json
 2- assets
 3    - css
 4    - js
 5    - images
 6- layouts
 7  - 404.html : 404错误页面模板
 8  - _default/ : 默认模板
 9    - baseof.html : 基础模板框架
10    - list.html : 列表页模板（如分类、标签页）
11    - single.html : 单内容页模板（如文章页）
12    - terms.html : 分类列表模板（如所有标签的列表）
13  - partials/ : 可重用部分模板
14    - header.html : 页头部分
15    - footer.html : 页脚部分
16    - head.html : <head>部分
17    - ... : 其他部分模板
18  - shortcodes/ : 短代码模板
19    - figure.html : 图片短代码
20    - ... : 其他短代码
21  - index.html : 首页模板
22  - section/ : 分区模板（如博客、文档等）
23    - blog.html : 博客分区模板
24    - ... : 其他分区模板
25  - taxonomy/ : 分类法模板
26    - category.html : 分类页面模板
27    - tag.html : 标签页面模板
28  - ... : 其他自定义模板

所有layouts模板均可

item.title: Hugo博客搭建记录

2tar -xvzf hugo_extended_0.147.9_Linux-64bit.tar.gz

4mv hugo /usr/bin

Start!

#

2. 重要配置&配置逻辑链
#

</> shell 
1git submodule add https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack themes/hugo-theme-stack

Hugo Tricks
#

1. 自定义样式
#

1. 样式覆盖规则：后引入覆盖前引入
#

  1. params.yaml配置中指定自定义custom_css
</> yaml 
1custom_css: ["scss/custom.scss"]
  1. assets/custom.scss中
</> scss 
1// 引入主题样式
2@import "general";
3// 引入你的自定义覆盖
4@import "custom-markdown"; // 无下划线、无扩展名

2. 自定义鸿蒙字体

  1. 下载鸿蒙字体
  2. 解压到siteproducer/assets/fonts目录
  3. 在assets/scss/中创建_fonts.scss，并在scss/custom.scss中引用
